pageContext.claim: “Under our horrible immigration laws, the Government is frequently blocked from deporting criminal aliens with violent felony convictions. House GOP just passed a bill to increase our ability to deport violent felons (Crazy Dems opposed). Need to get this bill to my desk fast!”
pageContext.analysis: Trump may believe the laws are "the world's worst," but Trump is mistaken — the U.S. has some of the most restrictive immigration laws. Plus, Trump's suggestion that the government is "blocked" is misleading. The government regularly deports undocumented immigrants who have committed crimes.
